verses.roman:
bhogera samaya punaḥ chuli' saṁskari'
kṛṣṇe samarpaṇa kare mukha chidra kari'

synonyms: bhogera samaya—at the time of offering bhoga; punaḥ—again; chuli'-clipping; saṁskari'-cleansing; kṛṣṇe—unto Lord Kṛṣṇa; samarpaṇa—offering; kare—makes; mukha—at the top; chidra kari'-making a hole.
translation: "At the time of offering bhoga, the coconuts are again clipped and cleansed. After holes are made in them, they are offered to Lord Kṛṣṇa.
